
``plotGiottoImage``
=======================

plotGiottoImage

Description
-----------

get plot a giotto image from a giotto object

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   plotGiottoImage(gobject, image_name)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``gobject``
     - giotto object
   * - ``image_name``
     - name of giotto image `\ ``showGiottoImageNames`` <#showgiottoimagenames>`_


Value
-----

plot
